languages.text: Successful attacks made by this creature apply Poison (TOU Save).

languages.text: This creature's successful attacks inflict poison (7) on targets that fail a Toughness resistance test.

languages.text: Los impactos de esta criatura infligen veneno (7) a los objetivos que no superen una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia.

traits.locale_text: Los impactos de esta criatura infligen veneno (7) a los objetivos que no superen una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia.

languages.text: この生物の攻撃が成功すれば、耐久力抵抗判定に失敗したターゲットに毒 (7) を与える。
languages.original_text: This creature's successful attacks inflict poison (7) on targets that fail a Toughness resistance test.

traits.locale_text: この生物の攻撃が成功すれば、耐久力抵抗判定に失敗したターゲットに毒 (7) を与える。

languages.text: 此生物的攻击命中目标后，目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，若未能通过检定则会承受毒素 （7）效果。
languages.original_text: This creature's successful attacks inflict poison (7) on targets that fail a Toughness resistance test.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的攻击命中目标后，目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，若未能通过检定则会承受毒素 (7）效果。

languages.text: Erfolgreiche Angriffe dieser Kreatur belegen Ziele, deren Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit misslingt, mit "Gift" (7).
languages.original_text: This creature's successful attacks inflict poison (7) on targets that fail a Toughness resistance test.

traits.locale_text: Erfolgreiche Angriffe dieser Kreatur belegen Ziele, deren Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit misslingt, mit "Gift" (7).

languages.text: Bu yaratığın başarılı saldırıları, Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçemeyen hedeflerde zehir (7) etkisi oluşturur.
